Nitrogen.Mild: Apply 20-30 kg/ha of urea as a foliar spray.
Nitrogen.Moderate: Apply 50 kg/ha of urea in split doses.
Nitrogen.Severe: Apply 80-100 kg/ha of urea with soil incorporation.

Phosphorus.Severe: Apply 60 kg/ha of superphosphate, deep placement.

Potassium.Mild: Foliar spray of 2% KCl weekly until symptoms disappear.
Potassium.Moderate: Apply 40 kg/ha of K2O and monitor plant response.
Potassium.Severe: Apply 80 kg/ha of K2O and incorporate into the soil.

Magnesium.Mild: Foliar spray of 5% MgSO4 or dolomite limestone at 3 t/ha.
Magnesium.Moderate: Apply 30-50 kg/ha of MgSO4 to the soil.
Magnesium.Severe: Apply 100 kg/ha of MgSO4 with irrigation water.

Iron.Mild: Soil application of FeSO4 (5 g/ha) or foliar spray of 0.5% FeSO4 weekly.
Iron.Moderate: Apply 10 g/ha of FeSO4 to the soil and monitor symptoms.
Iron.Severe: Apply chelated iron (EDDHA-Fe) for rapid correction.
